```{r setup}
library(eikosany)
```

```{r fig.width=7}
scale <- create_scale_table() # 1-3-5-7-9-11 Eikosany is the default
chords <- create_chord_table(scale, choose = 4)
chord_names <- chords$chord
degrees <- chords$degrees
degrees_matrix <- matrix(
  unlist(lapply(strsplit(degrees, ":"), as.numeric)),
  byrow = TRUE,
  nrow = length(degrees)
)

for (ichord in 1:nrow(degrees_matrix)) {
  chord_vector <- degrees_matrix[ichord, ]
  title_string <- paste(
    "Chord =",
    chord_names[ichord],
    ", Degrees =",
    degrees[ichord],
    sep = " "
  )
  piano_plot <- create_chord_plot(chord_vector, title_string)
  print(piano_plot)
}

```
